entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 10:17 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to light snow before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
